name: Guardian of the Dreamy World
description:
The evil dragon has arrived! 

Not only has it brought slimes, bats and disastrous fires,

but also stolen everyone's good dreams, leaving only nightmares!

The dreamy world needs you!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Developed by Nguyen, Yibai and Jiale for NUS GDG's Level 1 Game, 2022

Art assets and BGMs retrieved from https://itch.io/game-assets

Sound effects retrieved from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download
